text:
Work's done for today, right?
I'm off to have some fun again.

There are so many things around here
I've never seen before! It's exciting!

No, no... Even though it's daytime, I can't let you
wander around in an unfamiliar place alone.

Oh...
I'll make sure to stay in touch!

Ah, I want to try using the message board too.
If you look at it, Producer-san.
Ah, is that when you use it?

But, I still worry
about things like this...

Right, can I come along when you go out?
That would put my mind at ease.
